comment._content: Awesome photo. It gives a true sense of a time and place.

comment.author: 23625856@N08
comment._content: I wonder who the photographer was and where he and the man praying were going?  What is their story?  I'm sure it is fascinating!  I also wonder how this photo made it into a New York newspaper.  It is really an incredible photo, I could stare at it for hours and absorb the calmness.

comment.author: 11571226@N04
comment._content: This photo would make an excellent addition to the Encyclopedia of Life. Please consider adding it to the EOL Images group. EOL needs images for all 1.8 million known species, so you are also invited to share any of your other good photos, too.
